channel.title: 2 on Bo Sun
channel.description: Recent content in 2 on Bo Sun

item.title: Transcriptional trajectories of human kidney injury progression
item.description: Highlight In this research, I applied a Linear Mixed Model to achieve variance decomposition, which is pretty interesting. It helps us distinguish between genes that are explained more by confounding variables like sex, immune reponse, from the real signals that are explained by injury stage.

item.title: Late B lymphocyte action in dysfunctional tissue repair following kidney injury and transplantation
item.description: I’m second author in this paper. Primarily responsible for some data EDA and heatmap visualizations.

item.title: A Person Re-Identification System For Mobile Devices
item.description: More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.
